ygData.subject: Re: Levitate (spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: I had trouble finding the runes for levitate, so I bought it in Surefall Glade. Soren
ygData.messageBody:
I had trouble finding the runes for levitate, so I bought it in Surefall
Glade.

Soren



mstokes wrote:

> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> /em whips out his trusty spell list :)
>
> Levitate is a level 24 spell that cost 30? mana. It cannot be bought in
> Erudin, Akanon, or Qeynos. Skill is alteration, and the research
> components are expulsion and attraction.
